table_description: This table contains budget and cost details of a budget for a project. There will be multiple rows per budget where each row is a scope of work

columns.Name: id
columns.Comment: This is the unique identifier of the budget or cost scope

columns.Name: budget_id
columns.Comment: This is the id of the budget to which the cost or budget item belongs to

columns.Name: scope_name
columns.Comment: This is the name of the scope which is the head under which a budget is estimated or cost is accounted for

columns.Name: budget_amount
columns.Comment: The amount of budget for the specific scope

columns.Name: cost_amount
columns.Comment: The amount of cost for the specific scope

table_description: This table contains the name of the budgets for a project

columns.Name: id
columns.Comment: This is the unique identifier of the budget

columns.Name: project_id
columns.Comment: This is the id of the project to which the budget belongs to

columns.Name: title
columns.Comment: This is the name of the budget in a project

columns.Name: contingency
columns.Comment: The field contains the percentage of contingency of budget for the specific budget

table_description: This table contains the basic details of a project

columns.Name: id
columns.Comment: This is the unique identifier of the project

columns.Name: country_id
columns.Comment: This is the id of the country in which the project / store exists

columns.Name: name
columns.Comment: This is the name of the project which is also the name of a retail store

columns.Name: project_target_year
columns.Comment: The field contains the year in which the store is targetted to open

columns.Name: city
columns.Comment: The field contains the city in which the store is located

table_description: This table contains additional details of a project/store

columns.Name: IDX
columns.Comment: This is the unique identifier of the project

columns.Name: distribution_stream
columns.Comment: This is the enumerations which contains the following values IR MOB,SR MOB,MOB SR,MOB IR,CLASSIC,EXPERIENTIAL FLAGSHIP,POP UP,RESTAURANT,CHOCOLATE,MUB,Flagship,TEMP,KEY,CAFÃ‰,OTHERS,AIRPORT,VIC,GIFT SHOP,EXHIBITION and many more. Ignore the nulls

columns.Name: project_status
columns.Comment: This is the enumeration which contains values like Project approved,Planned project,Design in progress,Construction in progress,Planned project,Cancelled,Completed,Tender in progress and many more.Ignore the nulls

columns.Name: general_contractor
columns.Comment: The field contains the name of the general contractor for the project

columns.Name: project_type
columns.Comment: The field contains the data about the project type. THis is an enumeration which contains values like New Opening,Partial refurbishment,Refurbishment,Relocation, Full Refurbishment,Retail

table_description: This table contains names and ids of countries

columns.Name: countryid
columns.Comment: This is the unique identifier of the country

columns.Name: countryname
columns.Comment: This field contains the name of the country. When a user asks about a region you need to filter based on country names
